about_the_game:
This collection features a variety of tracks with a techno vibe, ranging from fast-paced to quiet pieces. The music can be used in various scenes such as story progression, battles, dungeons, and vehicles.

It includes versions with loop tags, short versions, and versions without rhythm, allowing for different uses in the early and later parts of a game, or for differentiating between dungeons and vehicles.

As a bonus, it includes various states of the basic 13 tracks, such as rhythm-free versions, length adjustments, and balance tweaks.

These tracks can be used as-is, or you can modify the pitch and tempo using music production software, mix them with your own compositions, and use them freely.

Note: The three-digit number in the track titles indicates the tempo, followed by the key code of the track.

Contents

ogg_loop (13 Files)

ogg_short (23 Files)

wav_24bit_48khz (13 Files)

wav_Bonus Track_24bit_48khz (24 Files)

Total 73 Files

--------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
